My name is Sergey. I'm from Russia.  I live in the city of Anapa. My hometown is Kemerovo. I am an online teacher of Russian and English. My main job is an air traffic controller. I love walking in parks, trekking (hiking), computer games.
teacher_info.short_signature: General and Aviation Courses from the Air-Traffic Controller

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Тщательно подготавливаю материал. Стараюсь сделать занятия интересными и разнообразными. Ваш прогресс очень важен для меня.
I prepare the material thoroughly. I try to make my classes interesting and varied. Your progress is very important to me.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Непринужденная обстановка. Материал подбирается индивидуально в соответствии с Вашими предпочтениями. Мы будем использовать в наших занятиях не только учебники, но и просмотр разнообразных видео на youtube, слушать музыку, описывать происходящее на картинке и многое другое.
Relaxed atmosphere. The material is selected individually according to your preferences. We will use in our classes not only textbooks, but also watching various videos on youtube, listening to music, describing what is happening in the picture and much more. It can be General or Aviation English.

course_info.trial_description:
На пробном уроке мы получше познакомимся и вы сможете рассказать о ваших предпочтениях и целях. Это поможет мне подготовить материалы для последующих уроков.
In a trial lesson, we will get to know each other better and you will be able to talk about your preferences and goals. This will help me prepare materials for subsequent lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: General English,  Job Interview, Aviation English ///  Общий английский, Подготовка к собеседованию, Авиационный английский
pro_course_detail.description:
В этом курсе мы изучим основные времена и пополним словарный запас. Научимся вести диалог. На занятиях мы будем читать книги и тексты, смотреть/слушать записи (видео, песни, аудио записи) на разные темы.
Данный курс содержит все четыре аспекта изучения иностранного языка: чтение, письмо, аудирование и говорение.
In this course, we will explore basic tenses, build vocabulary and learn how to conduct a dialogue. We will read books and texts, watch/listen recordings (videos, songs, audio recordings) on various topics.
This course contains all four aspects of learning a foreign language: reading, writing, listening and speaking.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык для любого уровня A1-C2 / Russian for any level A1-C2
pro_course_detail.description:
На наших занятиях мы можем разговаривать с Вами на любые темы. Будем описывать картинки, читать и обсуждать тексты/новости. Так же по желанию будем использовать интересный учебник.
In our classes we can talk with you on any topic. We will describe pictures, read and discuss texts/news. Also, if desired, we will use an interesting textbook.

pro_course_detail.title: Discounts for old students and for new students with a class 3 times a week
pro_course_detail.description: Discounts for old students and for students who book a class 3 times a week

pro_course_detail.title: Discounts for old students and for new students with a class 3 times a week
pro_course_detail.description: Discounts for old students and for new students with a class 3 times a week

teacher_info.intro: If you want to learn to speak Russian or English I can help you! My experience in teaching allows me to make creative and fun lessons. We can work specifically with pronunciation, or with grammar, or with vocabulary, or anything that you really need.
teacher_info.introduction:
Hi, I'm Anna.
* I'm a certified teacher of Russian and English as second languages.
*I have a masters degree and 10 years of off-line experience. I've been teaching on-line since 2013.
*I love teaching! I think it is fun. Though Russian is a very difficult language I'm sure it is interesting to learn it. Trust me after each lesson you'll see the improvements and you won't be afraid of speaking this beautiful language.
* I use communicative approach, but with beginners I work through the basics thoroughly. I present the material according to the communicative needs, but with carefully dosed portions. Even a beginner can interact with real Russian.
* With low-intermediate and advanced students we will practice specific grammar points in an engaging and natural way through conversational patterns and games.
teacher_info.about_me: If you want to learn to speak Russian or English I can help you! My experience in teaching allows me to make creative and fun lessons. We can work specifically with pronunciation, or with grammar, or with vocabulary, or anything that you really need.

edu_info.major: teaching English as a foreign language

cert_info.description:
Participation in online course for teachers of Russian as a foreign language. The program of the course includes methodical webinars:
1. Role of grammar in the communicative course of Russian as a foreign language. 
2. Methods of motivation learning Russian grammar. 
3. Necessary things about practical Russian grammar that you should know before entering the class. 
4. Passing from listening learning texts to understanding spoken language.

cert_info.certificate: teaching Russian as a foreign language

pro_course_detail.title: Russian speaking practice
pro_course_detail.description: If you're a bit tired of studying grammar or reading and answering questions, this is the lesson to book. Sometimes we all just need to feel the flow of a real conversation. Isn't it the reason why we all want to know a foreign language? I'm open to discuss any topics (even politics))) and help you with any vocabulary that you really need to express your opinion or ask for mine.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Everything you need to start speaking, reading and writing Russian:
*Russian alphabet
*Pronunciation
*Reading rules
*Grammar: cases, verbs conjugation

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for intermediate and advanced students
pro_course_detail.description:
The course includes a lot of speaking practice in focused conversations. The main aim is your feeling confident in using cases and conjugation of verbs together with increasing your vocabulary. 
With advanced students we'll use a special method of speech development based on reading works of literature, listening to modern Russian songs and watching modern Russian films.

pro_course_detail.title: English (all levels)
pro_course_detail.description: This course is for any level of English: from beginner to advanced. This course can make you move forward with your speaking skills with the help of grammar and developing your listening abilities.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone! My name is Bohdan, I'm from Dnipro, Ukraine. I am a native speaker of Russian and Ukrainian. I am also studying English. 

I am fond of such sports as football, jogging and workout. I am also learning how to shoot with a real medieval bow. I like to follow Formula-1 competitions. I like to study world history, the history of world religions and cultures of different countries. 

I follow the development of the global economy and work to improve my financial literacy. I am a real fan of reading books, especially classic works of world literature. And also, I love motivating and positive life stories. I will gladly share my experience of living in Ukraine.
teacher_info.short_signature: Learning Ukrainian is a new global trend. Join now!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello everyone! My name is Bohdan, I'm from Dnipro, Ukraine. I am a native speaker of Russian and Ukrainian. I am also studying English. 

I am fond of such sports as football, jogging and workout. I am also learning how to shoot with a real medieval bow. I like to follow Formula-1 competitions. I like to study world history, the history of world religions and cultures of different countries. 

I follow the development of the global economy and work to improve my financial literacy. I am a real fan of reading books, especially classic works of world literature. And also, I love motivating and positive life stories. I will gladly share my experience of living in Ukraine.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I constantly study English and constantly practice in Ukrainian and Russian. I love sharing my knowledge with others. It inspires me. I want to find a common language with wonderful people from different parts of our planet.

I am ready to motivate you to continue learning Russian or Ukrainian in moments of difficulty! Even when you make a lot of mistakes, it's not scary at all. I'm always glad to be of service to you. Therefore, I am ready to get in touch with you and will be glad to our communication. 

We can discuss all the points of interest in our trial lesson.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I am very flexible with my lessons. Our mistakes are an important part of learning. They are useful for our development. I want to show you that Ukrainian and Russian are not only difficult grammar. They are very beautiful languages and I am glad that you are learning them.

Speaking practice is important. I would say it is of decisive importance. I want to make you feel free and easy to communicate with other people. After all, communication destroys all boundaries between people. 

We can work on expanding your vocabulary in a specific area if you wish.

course_info.trial_description:
Сonversational practice in Russian or Ukrainian.

Together we will go on a wonderful journey through the expanses of such languages as Russian and Ukrainian.

pro_course_detail.title: Сonversational practice in Russian.
pro_course_detail.description:
I suggest you take part in speaking practice. The topics of conversation are extensive: lifestyle, culture, science, history, fashion, relationships, food or sports. Whatever you wish.

We can discuss current events in the world or talk about travel, outstanding paintings by great artists or funny animals. We can discuss the exciting topic of environmental protection or other important topics that relate to the problems of modern humanity.

On the other hand, we can chat about entertainment topics such as modern TV-series or world cinema classics.

I am open to new experiences and have no doubt that we have something to share with each other!

I will be happy to share my experience of living in Ukraine and share the experience of my travels around the world. I will also share with you the peculiarities of life in Ukraine and Russia.

pro_course_detail.title: Сonversational practice in Ukrainian.

I know the country from the inside with its traditions, features and oddities and for me online lessons is a great opportunity for introducing Russian culture to people who are interested all over the world.

Do you need help with pronounciation and conversation skills? I can help you reach your goals. Do you have problems with vocabulary or grammar? We can work on it together!

teacher_info.teaching_style:

Come study with me and I promise you won't be disappointed!

pro_course_detail.title: Basic Russian course
pro_course_detail.description: Russian fo beginners (A1-A2). Russian alphabet, reading techniques, the stress in Russian words, basic vocabulary, greetings, questions, personal information, nationalities, countries, numbers, main convesation topics.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian for all levels
pro_course_detail.description: General academic course according to your current level, needs and goals. We will practice grammar, pronunciation, listening and conversational skills. Speak only Russian. The first part of the lesson we will learn\practice grammar and pronunciation, the second part of the lesson we will practice listening and conversational skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice in Russian
pro_course_detail.description: This lessons are suitable for those who are looking to have classes that are focused on improving conversational skills and fluency. This lessons are also perfect for those who want to travel to Russia and would like to be expose to how Russian is used in everyday situations.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! My name is Viktoria. I'm a native Russian speaker and a teacher of Russian and Italian. I have a Bachelor degree in Linguistics and a Master's degree in Teaching Italian. I'm currently doing my PhD degree in Teaching Foreign Languages and I also teach Italian at the University.
I deeply understand how difficult it can be to learn a new foreign language. I will be happy to help you with it!
I'm also passionate about literature, music, traveling, cinema and psychology. I am sure that we will find something in common.
teacher_info.short_signature: University Professor with 5 years experience of teaching languages
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello! My name is Viktoria. I'm a native Russian speaker and a teacher of Russian and Italian. I have a Bachelor degree in Linguistics and a Master's degree in Teaching Italian. I'm currently doing my PhD degree in Teaching Foreign Languages and I also teach Italian at the University.
I deeply understand how difficult it can be to learn a new foreign language. I will be happy to help you with it!
I'm also passionate about literature, music, traveling, cinema and psychology. I am sure that we will find something in common.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have 5 years experience of teaching at all levels: from absolute beginners to more advanced students.
I know exactly what needs to be learned at each level, so I can help my students in the best possible way. 
Moreover, as for studying the Italian language, I can deeply understand your needs and difficulties because some years ago I was like you, too.
Если вы говорите на русском и хотите начать учить итальянский - я смогу доступно объяснить вам любые сложные моменты на русском.
If you are here because you want to learn Russian, добро пожаловать! Our main goal will be to start speaking as soon as possible and we will discover Russian culture together.
teacher_info.teaching_style: For me, the main goal of learning a foreign language is to be able to communicate effectively. Therefore, during the lessons I use only authentic materials - books, songs, dialogues, films, etc. In this way, my students learn to speak the language that is actually in use here and now. And at the same time our lessons become both interesting and informative.

exp_info.description: It was a very useful professional experience in teaching Italian for foreigners. I had to project my lessons by myself and prepare the students to B1-B2 tests in Italian.
I have 3 years experience as a private tutor working both online and face-to-face.

course_info.trial_description:
Let's get to know each other better! We can speak about your goals and plans in learning Russian or Italian and we can decide together how to proceed.
Conosciamoci! Sarò contenta di sapere i tuoi obiettivi nell'apprendimento del russo e possiamo decidere insieme come dobbiamo procedere.
Давайте узнаем друг друга по-лучше! Я буду рада узнать Ваши цели и задачи в изучении итальянского или русского языка. Так же мы сможем вместе подумать о плане дальнейших занятий.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners/Russo per principianti
pro_course_detail.description:
Have you always dreamed of speaking Russian? Let's start right now! During our lessons you will see that it's not as hard as you imagined!
We will learn how to read the Cyrillic alphabet, understand everyday conversations and speak so that Russians will definitely understand you.
I will try to make our lessons both interesting and productive. Every lesson will be carefully planned by me and you will also get some homework to do.

Se l'italiano è la tua lingua madre, sarà ancora più facile per te! Cercherò di spiegarti tutto nel modo più chiaro in italiano.

pro_course_detail.title: Давайте говорить по-русски!
pro_course_detail.description:
Давайте говорить по-русски! 
We can just choose a topic and chat or do some speaking tasks in order to improve your vocabulary and grammar so that you will feel more confident speaking Russian.
Я буду готовить материал для обсуждения и отправлять вам его перед каждым уроком. Вы также можете предлагать интересные для вас темы! Во время занятия мы будем:
- разбирать новые слова и выражения, увеличивая ваш словарный запас
- практиковать разговорную речь
- при необходимости обсуждать грамматические трудности

pro_course_detail.title: Italiano for beginners/Итальянский для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description:
We will study how to speak, read and understand one of the most musical languages in the world. 
Soon you will be able to order a coffee and chat with locals during your next trip to Italy. 
В этом курсе я постараюсь разложить итальянский язык по полочкам, так что во время следующей поездки в Италию Вы сможете заказать кофе в баре и даже поболтать с местными :)
Я буду тщательно планировать каждый урок индивидуально, подбирать материал, подходящий именно для вас, и обязательно давать домашние задания.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversazioni in Italiano
pro_course_detail.description:
In this course we will listen to Italian music, watch Italian films, read Italian books and articles and discuss them together. We can also chose a topic and speak so that can feel more confident speaking Italian. 
Before each lesson I will send you some material in Italian to discuss during the lesson. We will:
- talk about the topic chosen in advance 
- pay special attention to the new words and phrases
- talk about grammar if it is necessary
Если Вы уже говорите по-итальянски, мы будем улучшать Ваши навыки вместе, слушая песни, смотря фильмы, обсуждая книги и последние новости на итальянском. Также мы можем выбрать любую интересную для вас тему занятия.
Я буду подбирать материал и отправлять вам его перед каждым занятием. На занятии мы будем:
- обсуждать выбранную тему
- обращать внимание на новые слова и выражения
- при необходимости говорить о грамматике

pro_course_detail.title: Preparazione CELI/CILS/PLIDA
pro_course_detail.description: В этом курсе мы будем готовиться к сдаче экзамена на уровни B1-B2. Эти уровни часто требуются, например, для поступления в итальянский университет. На занятиях мы будем разбирать структуру экзамена, требования к сдающему и критерии оценки.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский в парах (Russian in groups of 2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Если у вас есть друзья, которые разделяют ваш интерес к русскому языку, давайте учиться вместе! 
Вместе веселее :)

teacher_info.intro:
Я народилась і виросла в Україні. Русский и украинский языки для меня родные. Я також говорю англійською мовою і зможу допомогти з перекладом у разі незрозумілої лексики.
Люблю подорожувати: завжди сама складаю маршрути і шукаю найцікавіші місця.
Також обожнюю слухати музику, грати, читати.
Всегда любила и люблю общаться с людьми, особенно с жителями других стран, носителями других культур. Могу много рассказать про свою родную Украину: как живем, что поем, о чем шутим.
Можу допомогти опанувати письмову мову, у тому числі ділову переписку. Маю величезний досвід листування з офіційними організаціями. 
Надеюсь быть полезным и интересным собеседником.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
По желанию изучающего язык могу подготовить тематические беседы: бизнес, увлечения, туризм и тому подобное.  
Можу навчити писати невеликі твори або пости для соціальних мереж.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Уроки можу проводити у майже будь-якому месенджері, що дозволить відео зустріч.

course_info.trial_description:
Короткая беседа про особенности жизни в Украине, новости и определение тем, которые будут интересны в будущем.
Коротка розмова про особливості життя в Україні, новини та визначення тем, що будуть цікавими в майбутньому.

pro_course_detail.title: Приятная беседа за чашкой чая
pro_course_detail.description: В непринужденной обстановке беседа обо всем на свете, как обычно беседует пара закадычных друзей. Простые, но очень популярные темы, а словарный запас к ним может варироваться в зависимости от уровня владения языком

pro_course_detail.title: Поговоримо про виховання дітей
pro_course_detail.description: У кожної родини є свої секрети у вихованні дітей. Я залюбки поділюсь своїми і дізнаюсь нові лайфхаки. І потренуємо лексику про сім'ю.

pro_course_detail.title: Приємна розмова про все на світі
pro_course_detail.description: Розмовна практика на будь-які теми. В залежності від рівня володіння мовою учня лексичне наповнення уроку буде змінюватись (від простих повсякденних слів та виразів до фразеологічних зворотів). Для тих, хто поки що не володіє українською зовсім, мовою пояснень буде англійська чи російська на вибір.

course_info.trial_description:

See you at my class!

teacher_info.intro: Hi there! I'm Anastasia. Most of all I love jokes (especially silly ones) and actually I can talk about anything (just because I love talking). But my favorite activities and topics are fitness, music, food, languages, psychology, customs and traditions, philosophy, travelling. Teaching is my number one activity and passion, but also I'd like to study music, medicine and history.
teacher_info.short_signature: I'm that teacher who'll make you feel like you're at a brunch with Russian friends
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello everybody and welcome to my profile! I’m Anastasia, nice to meet you :)
First of all, I would like to thank you, exactly you for visiting my profile! I was eagerly waiting for you :)
Now it’s time that I introduced myself!

What I am:

*** I’m a superwoman ready to come to your Russian language skills’ rescue anytime ( though I don’t wear a red cape ) :)

*** Also...a native Russian speaker, a professional and experienced Russian teacher, a linguist, a methodologist and a translator, an active language learner and friends maker :)

*** A very modest person of 10 talents and 100 hobbies...which means no boredom is guaranteed :)

*** And, definitely, the one who will help you master the Russian language and feel confident to speak it! 

What I offer:

*** Informal Tutoring.
You have questions concerning certain aspects of Russian? I have answers! 
When you decide on informal tutoring, be ready to come with your questions, materials, topics to be discussed, anything that you might have problems with or interested in - I’m here to give you feedback, correct mistakes and provide you with a deeper comprehension of the language!

*** Professional Lessons. 
You are serious about learning Russian? You love challenges? Then jokes aside! 
I offer various communicative and natural methods, critical thinking development technology based individually planned and structured lessons for different purposes.

The courses I offer are as follows:

--- General Russian Course for Beginners | Hello, world! ---
--- General Russian Course ---

Got curious?
Check the description of every course below!
And hurry up - book a trial lesson with me ;)
teacher_info.about_me: Hi there! I'm Anastasia. Most of all I love jokes (especially silly ones) and actually I can talk about anything (just because I love talking). But my favorite activities and topics are fitness, music, food, languages, psychology, customs and traditions, philosophy, travelling. Teaching is my number one activity and passion, but also I'd like to study music, medicine and history.
teacher_info.about_teacher: At my lessons there will always be freedom of expression. I never judge anyone for accent, lack of homework or mistakes, but we actually can make fun of those together (and you'll definitely learn faster if you treat lessons as something fun!). My highest priority is that my students feel comfortable and secure. Also, I'm a very flexible person and teacher, which means we may avoid certain topics, or on the contrary add some to the list in case if you're very interested in learning more about those.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I don't really like plagiarism, that's the main reason why I teach using my own materials (based both on my personal vision and government standards). We're gonna follow a plan and use Google Docs with clearly explained theory, followed by many examples and exercises of any kind (audios recorded by me or borrowed from Youtube, Russian songs, texts, grammar and speaking tasks, vocabulary lists with pictures, movies fragments, etc.). The more practice of any type, the better.

edu_info.description: During my studies I mainly focused on teaching methods, approaches and techniques popular in Russian methodology and foreign as well. Despite the fact that the range of tools is wide, I personally chose several ones: complex approach, communicative and natural methods, critical thinking development technology. I practised these all while pedagogical practice in a lyceum and am currently using this mix in my educational work.

cert_info.institution: Moscow State University Russian Language Centre
cert_info.certificate: Methods of teaching Russian as a foreign language

course_info.trial_description:
Make sure that your equipment (webcam, headphones, microphone, communication tool, etc.) works!

During our first lesson:
- we'll get acquainted
- we'll talk in Russian to assess your level (maybe read or translate something as well)
- we'll agree on a learning strategy
- I'll show you all my teaching materials
- I'll answer all your questions
- I'll send you an offline document with resources to create a language immersion.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking practice (based on books, articles & series)
pro_course_detail.description: Speaking practice lessons based on articles, literature (authentic Russian books or the ones translated into Russian, no kids stories), tv series, shows and films. You'll be provided with homework before each lesson (a book fragment or a podcast, or a movie fragment + vocabulary from those, questions or / and tasks to practice the vocab). We'll work in your personal Google Document (where you'll have all tasks and full access to edit the content) + at the end of the lesson I'll send you audio recording with all the vocab that we study.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian (grammar, reading, listening, writing & speaking)
pro_course_detail.description: General Russian lessons where we practice all aspects of the language. You'll be provided with a personal Google Document with full access to edit the content where there will be all necessary rules and tasks to build balanced grammar, listening, reading and speaking comprehension. The Google Document is also followed by homework + audio recording with the vocabulary and tasks we study to revise them later on your own.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking practice (unprepared spontaneous conversations)
pro_course_detail.description: Natural conversations without preparation from student's side. I have a Google Document with hundreds of questions on numerous topics which we can discuss. You'll be provided with a personal Google Document where I'm gonna write all words and expressions which you may need to express your opinions. Also, at the end of the lesson I'll add all the questions we'll discuss, so you can revise them later (+audio recording with all vocabulary and questions themselves).

I am a qualified teacher with a Bachelor’s Degree in Political Science and a Master’s degree in Economics from Zhejiang University. I teach Conversational English for different levels, Test Preparation for IELTS and TOEFL .
 I’m fluent in Mandarin Chinese, I also study Thai language myself.

FULLY QUALIFIED AND READY TO HELP YOU ACHIEVE YOUR GOALS:

Learn Business English

我是一个合格的老师，并准备好帮助你实现你的目标：商业英语，学术英语，准备好面试，用英语打电话。你提前告诉我你的要求，然后我们一起可以选最合适你的学习方法。你只要努力学习，就会成功。加油！

course_info.trial_description:
Hello!

My 30 minute trial lesson is a chance for you to introduce yourself so I can learn who you are, why you are learning English and what your goals are, and give you a chance to meet me. In the trial lesson I can give you tips, websites and materials, English learning methods and recommended books.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS Preparation
pro_course_detail.description: This class is intended for those seeking to boost their scores on the IELTS exam. I will help you to become more familiar with the various types of questions on the test. The many tips and strategies demonstrated by me will prepare you to perform your best to attain the scores you seek. This exam-focused class is specifically designed for those who want to get an academic experience abroad or migrate to a country of your choice. It is carefully crafted with students’ needs in mind.

pro_course_detail.title: Intensive Writing Course (IELTS and TOEFL)
pro_course_detail.description:
Academic writing with great attention to detail. We will learn how to plan, how to write and how to revise your essay.  I will present step-by-step methods for completing the writing section of TOEFL and IELTS.
I will also provide the tools necessary for successful academic writing ( books, templates and vocabulary sets)

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English Lesson
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's practice having a conversation and making "small talk" in English.
70% student talking time with our focus on building your speaking confidence and fluency. 
Written corrections and feedback after each lesson, class recordings available on request.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский (speaking practice)
pro_course_detail.description:
Choose this option if your Russian is intermediate or higher and you have a basic knowledge of Russian grammar, but you need more speaking practice. 
 Written corrections and feedback after each lesson, class recordings available on request.

pro_course_detail.title: Сочинение ( Writing Course)
pro_course_detail.description: The purpose of this class is to help you improve your Russian writing skills. We will learn how to plan, how to write and how to revise your essay. I will also provide the tools necessary for successful academic writing ( books, templates and vocabulary sets)

pro_course_detail.title: Русская литература (Russian literature)
pro_course_detail.description: Russian literature formed a national cultural code and formed a manner to feel and think.  What makes Russian literature so special? It is the force, the directness, the honesty and accuracy with which they depicted the most essential aspects of history. If you want to get familiar with the concepts of Tolstoy, Dostoevsky and Chekhov, you should get this course.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Мои уроки подойдут как начинающим, так и продвинутым студентам. Преимущественно работаю со взрослыми студентами.
I offer classes in Russian for all levels. I'm specialized on working with adult students.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Для каждого ученика я составляю индивидуальный план обучения в зависимости от его потребностей. На занятиях я использую много иллюстраций и различных игр, стараюсь делать свои уроки интересными и интерактивными.
I make a personal training plan for each student, depending on their needs. I use a lot of pictures and quizzes in my lessons. I always try to make my lessons interesting and interactive.

course_info.trial_description:
First, we will get to know each other. Then you will know how to introduce yourself in Russian and the Russian alphabet (if you're a beginner). Or we will have a conversation if you've learned Russian before. 
Сначала мы познакомимся друг с другом. Затем, вы узнаете, как рассказать о себе по-русски и познакомитесь с русским алфавитом (если вы начинающий). Если вы уже изучали русский язык, мы поговорим на разные темы.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
If you're just starting to learn Russian these lessons will be perfect for you. You will learn how to read and write the letters, pronounce the words. Also you will start to make simple sentences. 
Если вы только начинаете изучать русский язык, эти уроки будут идеальны для вас. Вы научитесь читать и писать русские буквы, произносить правильно слова. Также вы сможете составлять простые предложения на русском языке.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
If you're not a beginner please choose these lessons. We will study grammar, train your listening, reading, writing and speaking skill. 
Эти уроки для вас, если вы уже немного знаете русский. На уроках мы будем изучать грамматику, развивать все виды речевой деятельности (аудирование, чтение, письмо, говорение).

For NEW STUDENTS
When booking the first lesson message me some information about you. How long have you been learning language? What is your level? Also let me know if you have special needs to learn language like traveling, working or examen. I adjust material to your needs and level.

What is my INFORMAL tutoring?
For this lesson I don't prepare any material or plan. We talk about whatever you want. I help you with pronunciation, to learn new vocabulary, expressions and correct your grammar mistakes. Please message me if you want to be corrected and stopped after every mistake, to be corrected in skype chat or we talk fluently.

CANCELLATION
Lessons cancelled with less than 24 hours notice will have to be paid for.

teacher_info.introduction:
Hello! My name is Elizabeth, I'm a professional teacher of the English language. I've been teaching for 3 years now. I have taught people of different ages and backgrounds. I believe that the best qualities a teacher should have are fluency in the target language, flexibility, patience, and the ability to personalize learning materials for each student. I will plan our lessons according to your individual needs and I'll do my best to help you feel confident and comfortable with the language you are learning. I myself love learning languages and I know what difficulties you may face learning a new language. I am also a native Russian speaker so if you need any help improving your Russian feel free to contact me. 

Всем привет! Добро пожаловать на мою страничку. Я преподаю английский уже в течении 3х лет. Независимо от Вашего возраста и уровня владения языком я помогу вам чувствовать себя более уверенно говоря на английском. Я так же считаю очень важными навыки восприятия на слух иностранной речи, достаточный словарный запас для выражения своих мыслей и произношение. Последнее по моему мнению одно из самых больших упущений большинства учеников и, к сожаленю, преподавателей. Моя задача сделать изучение языка максимально эффективным и занимательным. Увидимся на занятиях!

teacher_info.intro:
Всем привет! Меня зовут Андрей и я являюсь носителем русского языка из центральной части Российской Федерации. У меня высшее образование в области автоматизации производств, и я работаю АйТи специалистом в крупной международной химической компании.
Мой уровень английского языка –выше среднего, что подтверждено моей успешной сдачей международного кембриджского экзамена FCE и я оцениваю свои знания английского языка достаточными для объяснения моим будущим ученикам любого обучающего материала, который может вызывать у них затруднения на русском.
teacher_info.about_me:
Всем привет! Меня зовут Андрей и я являюсь носителем русского языка из центральной части Российской Федерации. У меня высшее образование в области автоматизации производств, и я работаю АйТи специалистом в крупной международной химической компании.
Мой уровень английского языка –выше среднего, что подтверждено моей успешной сдачей международного кембриджского экзамена FCE и я оцениваю свои знания английского языка достаточными для объяснения моим будущим ученикам любого обучающего материала, который может вызывать у них затруднения на русском.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Хотя я не профессиональный преподаватель, у меня огромный опыт в изучении иностранного языка. По большом счету не важно, какой у вас уровень знаний русского языка. Вместе мы разработаем индивидуальную стратегию для вашего обучения. Я думаю, что основное препятствие на пути к успеху в изучении языков для каждого – это страх сделать ошибку. Таким образом, я настоятельно рекомендую вам взять за правило или сделать лозунг – не бояться делать ошибки. Однако, я буду аккуратно вас поправлять в течение наших занятий.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Я убежден в том, чтобы сделать занятия эффективными, в первую очередь они должны быть интересными и что любой язык оживает благодаря общению. Вследствие этого, мои занятия в основном направлены на разговорную практику. Мы будем увеличивать ваш словарный запас из разных тем, работать над грамматикой и произношением. Я сделаю все возможное для того, чтобы помочь вам с языковыми трудностями.
Пожалуйста не стесняйтесь взять у меня пробный урок и я уверен, что вы не будете разочарованы.

For 10 years I had been working as a university teacher, participated in the writing of textbooks and educational materials. I have been working as a private teacher for the last 4 years.
I love not only to teach, but also to learn, I try to constantly learn something new.
A mind that has once expanded its borders will never return to old. Albert Einstein.
teacher_info.introduction: Hello! I`m Julia, a native Russian speaker and a professional teacher of Russian as a foreign language. For 7 years I worked in the University's preparatory faculty, where for 10 months students are studying the Russian language for higher education in Russian universities. I worked with groups of students. My students were from Syria, Libya, Algeria, Angola, Burundi, Mongolia, China, Laos, Myanmar and other countries. The last 4 years I have been working in the immersion program. My students are the employees of the English-speaking embassies or large foreign companies. My classes are one-on-one and I develop individual programs for each student according to his or her abilities and objectives. And I always try to create an atmosphere where the students are able to relax and express themselves freely. Please, feel free to contact me and book a trial lesson. See you soon!

I absolutely understand the specifics of this method, I have developed and collected a huge amount of materials. Nevertheless, the material will be selected or developed individually for each student.

teacher_info.intro:
I am a professional teacher of Russian as a foreign language.

I'm an open-minded person and can discuss various subjects (some of my favourite ones are travelling, creativity, yoga, nature, ecology and cooking). I also like to talk about how people live in general: how they communicate, work, rest, travel, raise kids or eat. I'm looking forward to getting to know you better and to discovering your favourite subjects!

For total beginners I offer classes based on comprehensive textbook s that'll take you from zero level to A1/A2. 
Welcome aboard! ;)

teacher_info.about_teacher: Whether you're just starting your journey with the Russian language or speak it and want to improve, we can meet online and spend some time chatting! I'm good at explaining things and I know what it takes to learn a language :)
teacher_info.teaching_style:
At the conversation practice lesson we'll be mostly talking, but if you have any questions concerning grammar or other things I'll be happy to help.

If you choose a General Russian lesson, we'll follow a textbook focusing on various aspects of the language.

course_info.trial_description: This is a great chance to get to know each other. During a trial lesson we can discuss your learning goals and how we can best achieve them or... just practise talking!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Welcome to an hour of authentic Russian! This class is more suited for those who already have a basic knowledge of the language. Let's talk about anything in the world from cultural integration and ecology to your child's favourite games :-) 
If you’re a beginner, you can still book this class and learn to make up your first phrases in Russian and keep small conversations.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
This class is suited even for complete beginners of Russian! It'll take you from zero level to A1/A2. I use various books as the basis for mastering the Russian grammar and acquiring new vocabulary. We speak quite a lot starting from the first lessons, thus my students learn to apply the new structures / words in natural speech.
Taking two or three classes a week guarantees you a quick and tangible progress. If you only want to take one class a week I highly recommend opting for 90 minute classes (a short break included).
